descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/2126/sl01warglaivesandsilver.jpg[/img]
released on 18-th of February 2012
Category: Weapons and Armor
Author: jojjo

[color=red][b]NEW MOD RELEASED: DEMON HUNTER ARMOR:[/color][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42169/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D42169&pUp=1[/url] by Jojjo and GraceDarkling and zzjay.


[youtube]YhN2EMc0GfY[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thank you for making this video, andymanz67![/color]

[youtube]NkLRm8r4tbY[/youtube]
[color=lime]Thank you, Saiodin![/color]

[color=lime][b]RELATED MODS:[/color][/b]
[color=lime]The UNP version you can find here:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12329]Silverlight Armor for DIMONIZED UNP Body[/url] by Falridorian.
[color=lime]Retextures you can find here:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14035]Silverlight Armor clothing version ESP only[/url] by masiyuan1989.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15329]Silvernight Armour[/url] dark retexture by Frozzled.

[img]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/1144/sl04description.jpg[/img]
 
These are two independant of each other mods! All the meshes and textures were made from scratch.
- Silverlight Armor
================
Adds forgable Silverlight Armor to the game (skin and chainmail versions, female only). Cuirass, Boots, Gauntlets, Circlet, Helm, Full helm. All the parts are light armor so you can use the benefits of Custom Fit and Matching Set perks.
- Warglaives
===========
Adds forgable Warglaives to the game. Sword (Right hand), ofhand sword (Left hand) and shield. Recommended to equip\'em that way otherwise the weapon will be turned around the vertical axis and the protector cuts with the hand.
Optional glow colors included in Data\\meshes\\weapons\\jojjosglaives\\Optional folder. Choose your color and copy/paste the included files over those in the previous folder Data\\meshes\\weapons\\jojjosglaives.

[img]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/3218/sl05requirements.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]Calientes Female Body Mod[/url]

[img]http://img842.imageshack.us/img842/8629/sl06location.jpg[/img]
Two ways to obtain the armor and the glaives:
- Go to Shriekwind Bastion (NE of Falkreath) and fight for it.
The armor can be found at the lower levels - look for three bandits around a withered tree. The warglaives are at the top levels just before a curved stairs.
- Use forge - Elven section. Required skill - Elven Smithing.

[img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/1648/sl07issues.jpg[/img]
The circlet and helmets were made for human head so they work only on human and elf races.
The armor doesn\'t scale with the body slider. I can\'t afford to make two models to achieve that.

[img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/4363/sl08install.jpg[/img]
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and Silverlight Armor.esp and paste\'em in your Skyrim/Data folder. \"Yes to all\" when/if asked. Start Skyrim Launcher. In Data Files mark Silverlight Armor.

[img]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/7949/sl09uninstall.jpg[/img]
Uncheck Silverlight Armor in Skyrim Launcher Data Files.
Delete:
- Silverlight Armor.esp from your Data folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor\\Silverlight folder
- Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Silverlight folder

[img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/2227/sl10credits.jpg[/img]
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Bethesda[/color][/b] for the best games and the Creation Kit.
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Blizzard[/color][/b] for the warglaives concept.
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Caliente[/color][/b] for the beautiful female body.
Thanks to [color=lime][b]Frozzled[/color][/b] for weight slider version.

[img]http://img813.imageshack.us/img813/6400/sl11licence.jpg[/img]
This mod was created only for using here on skyrim.nexusmods.com. Contact me before doing anything new with the stuff.
author: jojjo and Frozzled
